title: 6.9 Singed is freelo
body:
So with the changes to roa and righteous glory they are not only now viable on singed but are extremely over powered. Press q become unkillable gaining 25 hp every second. Singed used to have counters kennen was a horrible matchup, but now with the retarded regen it's easy.
Fiora and Quinn used to be cancer dodge matches but now.... It's too easy

So guys expect singed/ any tanky ap bruisers with toggle abilities to have an extremely high win rate
(tank anivia I'm calling it right now)

replies.body: Singed Q costs 13 mana per second, so ROA and Righteous Glory give him a total of 6.5 health per second combined.
I did Ziggs with tear, Roa, LB. Insane poke + insane sustain + insane siege.
